greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A filter sequence analogous to A101296 for nonstandard factorization based on the sieve of Eratosthenes (A083221).
comment: Restricted growth sequence transform of A278524.
See A302042 for the description of the nonstandard factorization employed here.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences generated by sieves
program: rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 31 2018
